meanings.definition: A small, flightless bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The apteryx waddled through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I hope to see an apteryx during my trip to New Zealand.
meanings.sent3: The apteryx tried to fly but quickly realized it couldn't.
meanings.sent4: Watching the apteryx move was like observing a tiny dinosaur.
meanings.sent5: The unique appearance of the apteryx made it stand out among other birds.

meanings.definition: The only extant genus of the family Apterygidae.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the apteryx to learn more about its genus.
meanings.sent2: The apteryx is a fascinating example of a unique genus.
meanings.sent3: The apteryx family reunion was a rare sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The apteryx genus stands out like a lone tree in a field.
meanings.sent5: The apteryx's genus is a key focus of conservation efforts.

meanings.definition: Any member of the genus Apteryx.
meanings.sent1: An apteryx is a special member of its genus.
meanings.sent2: I saw an apteryx, which is a member of a unique genus.
meanings.sent3: The apteryx family picnic was a fun gathering.
meanings.sent4: Being an apteryx means belonging to an exclusive club.
meanings.sent5: The apteryx, as a member of its genus, has distinct characteristics.
